Class AnswerListPageTest

java.lang.Object
application.AnswerListPageTest
public class AnswerListPageTest extends Object
This class contains JUnit test cases for the AnswerListPage and Answer class. It tests various functionalities such as viewing, posting, resolving, updating, and deleting answers.

  • Method Details

    • setUp

      public void setUp() throws SQLException
      Sets up the test environment before each test case. Initializes the database connection, creates an admin user, a question, and an answer. Also initializes the AnswerListPage instance for testing.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an issue with the database connection.

    • tearDown

      public void tearDown()
      Cleans up the test environment after each test case. Closes the database connection to ensure no resource leaks.

    • testViewAnswer_Success

      public void testViewAnswer_Success() throws SQLException
      Tests the functionality of viewing an answer. Verifies that the answer is correctly fetched from the database and matches the expected values. Checks to see if an answer has been selected before doing CRUD operations.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an issue with the database query.

    • testPostAnswer_Success

      public void testPostAnswer_Success() throws SQLException
      Tests the functionality of posting a new answer. Verifies that the new answer is successfully added to the database and can be retrieved. Checks to see if an answer has been selected before doing CRUD operations.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an issue with the database query.

    • testResolveAnswer_Success

      public void testResolveAnswer_Success() throws SQLException
      Tests the functionality of resolving an answer. Verifies that the answer is successfully marked as resolved in the database. Checks to see if an answer has been selected before doing CRUD operations.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an issue with the database query.

    • testUpdateAnswer_Success

      public void testUpdateAnswer_Success() throws SQLException
      Tests the functionality of updating an answer. Verifies that the answer text is successfully updated in the database. Checks to see if an answer has been selected before doing CRUD operations.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an issue with the database query.

    • testDeleteAnswer_Success

      public void testDeleteAnswer_Success() throws SQLException
      Tests the functionality of deleting an answer. Verifies that the answer is successfully removed from the database. Checks to see if an answer has been selected before doing CRUD operations.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an issue with the database query.
